Steps.Speaker: Orc
Steps.Text: Little humans think they can steal from a Tevinter Magister? I will crush your skulls into lyrium dust!

Steps.Speaker: Dougal
Steps.Text: Less talking, more bleeding, you oversized brute!

Steps.Speaker: Dougal
Steps.Text: Ogre mercenaries. The Magister is pulling out all the stops. We're getting close to the inner sanctum.

Steps.Speaker: Guard
Steps.Text: Intruders! It's them! Just like the dock-watch reported! Sound the alarm!

Steps.Speaker: Dougal
Steps.Text: See, Ambrose?! What did I tell you about loose ends!

Steps.Speaker: Ambrose
Steps.Text: Quiet as a whisper. See, Dougal? Clearing out the docks paid off. They have no idea we're in the courtyard.

Steps.Speaker: Ambrose
Steps.Text: Alright, the entrance to the artifact vault is just ahead. It's guarded by the Magister's elite.

Choices.Text: I'll use my Venatori disguise to bribe our way past.

Steps.Speaker: Ambrose
Steps.Text: A few gold sovereigns can open doors that swords cannot. Follow my lead.

Choices.Text: Dougal, kick the doors in. We take them by surprise.

Steps.Speaker: Ambrose
Steps.Text: Good evening, captain. The Magister sent us to audit the lyrium reserves. Here is your... handling fee.

Steps.Speaker: Guard
Steps.Text: I... uh... alright. But make it quick. If the Magister finds you down here...

Steps.Speaker: Dougal
Steps.Text: I can't believe that actually worked. Let's grab the idol and get out of here.

Steps.Speaker: Dougal
Steps.Text: That's the last of them. See? A good blade beats a bribe any day of the week.

Steps.Speaker: Ambrose
Steps.Text: I suppose. Though my dry-cleaning bill is going to be astronomical. To the inner vault!
